sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react' import Context from '../../../helper/Context' import './Weather.css' import { mapCodesToImage } from '../../../helper/constants' import DetailsTemperature from '../../../components/DetailsTemperature' export default function Weather() { const arrData = useContext(Context) const data = arrData.weatherData[0] let srcWeather if(data){ srcWeather = mapCodesToImage[data.weather.icon] } return ( <> {data && (
{data.temp !== 0 ? (data.temp > 0 ? '+' : '--−') : ''}

{Math.round(Math.abs(data.temp))}°

{arrData.nameCity}: {data.weather.description.toLowerCase()}

)} ) }
